attributes.action: we should ban detention after school  especially in the winter
attributes.additional_details: i think we should ban detentions everywhere after school in winter because of how dangerous it is for example my friend tanisha  was really scared to go home after detention.
attributes.background: in winter it will be really dark and kids might get scared,they might be kidnapped /robbed.instead i think detentions should be happening in launch time or break time because in winter if kids are late parents get worried as well

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban schools from giving after-school detentions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734838
